body.p:
I will give the above Reward for the apprehension and lodgement in any jail, where I can get him, within Five months of this date, of
Samuel McRoberts,
Who escaped from the Lewis County Jail, on the night of the 12th of February, 1861,
Said McRoberts is about 5 feed 8 or 9 inches high, quick spoken, indistinct utterance, slender built, black eyes and dark hair.

A. G. Rice, J. L. C.
Clarksburg, Ky., February 13th, 1861.
